summary: Add and update data in TimescaleDB.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: The operation to perform in TimescaleDB, such as executing a query, inserting rows, or updating rows.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The SQL query to execute. Supports n8n expressions and query parameters.

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: Name of the schema the table belongs to for insert or update operations.

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Name of the table to insert data to or update data in.

parameters.name: update key
parameters.description: Name of the property that decides which rows in the database should be updated.

parameters.name: columns
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of properties to use as columns for new rows or rows to update.

parameters.name: return fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields that the operation will return.

parameters.name: additional fields
parameters.description: Additional options for sending queries to the database, such as execution mode and query parameters.
